DOC.brief_summary: This study will be carried out in healthy volunteers with the primary objective to evaluate the pharmacokinetic interaction between Glyco and Formoterol administered using a pressurised metered dose inhaler (pMDI).
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Interaction Study of Glycopyrrolate and Formoterol in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Males and females healthy volunteers aged 1865 years will be included in the study.
